languages.text:
The Cyber-Mastiff now interacts with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Exploits{/g}.
If the Overseer starts their turn in half-cover, the Cyber-Mastiff receives {uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}% bonus to Dodge and Parry, and also {uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} MP.
If the Overseer starts their turn in full cover, these effects are doubled.

traits.locale_text:
The Cyber-Mastiff now interacts with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Exploits{/g}.
If the Overseer starts their turn in half-cover, the Cyber-Mastiff receives {uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}% bonus to Dodge and Parry, and also {uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} MP.
If the Overseer starts their turn in full cover, these effects are doubled.

languages.text:
When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
If the Overseer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and has its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} increased by +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}%.
If the Overseer starts their turn in full cover, these bonuses are doubled.
languages.original_text:
Атакуя цель, на которую наложены {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимости{/g}, кибермастиф получает такой же бонус к наносимому урону, как и его {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g}. Аналогично атаки фамильяра снимают все {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимости{/g} с цели.
Если надзиратель начинает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}частичном укрытии{/g}, на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} его кибермастиф получает +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}.
Если надзиратель начинает свой ход в полном укрытии, эти бонусы удваиваются.

traits.locale_text:
When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
If the Overseer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and has its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} increased by +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}%.
If the Overseer starts their turn in full cover, these bonuses are doubled.

When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
If the Overseer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and has its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} increased by +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}%.
If the Overseer starts their turn in full cover, these bonuses are doubled.

When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
If the Overseer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and has its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} increased by +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}%.
If the Overseer starts their turn in full cover, these bonuses are doubled.

languages.text:
Cuando ataca a un objetivo que tiene {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnerabilidades{/g}, el cibermastín obtiene la misma bonificación al daño que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}. Su ataque elimina todas las {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnerabilidades{/g} del objetivo.
Si el supervisor empieza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} tras {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura parcial{/g}, durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} el cibermastín gana +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y tanto su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} como su {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} aumentan un +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} %.
Si el supervisor empieza su turno tras cobertura total, estas bonificaciones se duplican.
languages.original_text:
When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
If the Overseer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and has its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} increased by +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}%.
If the Overseer starts their turn in full cover, these bonuses are doubled.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando ataca a un objetivo que tiene {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnerabilidades{/g}, el cibermastín obtiene la misma bonificación al daño que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}. Su ataque elimina todas las {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnerabilidades{/g} del objetivo.
Si el supervisor empieza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} tras {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura parcial{/g}, durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} el cibermastín gana +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y tanto su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} como su {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} aumentan un +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} %.
Si el supervisor empieza su turno tras cobertura total, estas bonificaciones se duplican.

languages.text:
当生化獒犬攻击拥有{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}研究{/g}效果的目标时，会获得与{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}同样程度的伤害加成效果。生化獒犬攻击后，会移除目标身上所有{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}研究{/g}效果层数。
如果监察官回合{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}开始{/g}时处于{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}半身掩体{/g}的保护下，则生化獒犬额外获得{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，且{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
如果监察官回合开始时处于全身掩体的保护下，则上述加成翻倍。
languages.original_text:
When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
If the Overseer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and has its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} increased by +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}%.
If the Overseer starts their turn in full cover, these bonuses are doubled.

traits.locale_text:
当生化獒犬攻击拥有{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}研究{/g}效果的目标时，会获得与{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}同样程度的伤害加成效果。生化獒犬攻击后，会移除目标身上所有{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}研究{/g}效果层数。
如果监察官回合{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}开始{/g}时处于{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}半身掩体{/g}的保护下，则生化獒犬额外获得{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，且{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
如果监察官回合开始时处于全身掩体的保护下，则上述加成翻倍。

languages.text:
Lorsqu'il attaque une cible présentant des {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnérabilités{/g}, le cyber-mastiff bénéficie du même bonus de dégâts que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}. Son attaque supprime tous les cumuls de {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnérabilité{/g} de la cible.
Si le surveillant commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} en bénéficiant d'une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture partielle{/g}, le cyber-mastiff reçoit un bonus de +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} et bénéficie d'une {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g} augmentées de +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} %.
Si le surveillant commence son tour en bénéficiant d'une couverture totale, ces bonus sont doublés.
languages.original_text:
When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
If the Overseer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and has its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} increased by +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}%.
If the Overseer starts their turn in full cover, these bonuses are doubled.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsqu'il attaque une cible présentant des {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnérabilités{/g}, le cyber-mastiff bénéficie du même bonus de dégâts que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}. Son attaque supprime tous les cumuls de {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}vulnérabilité{/g} de la cible.
Si le surveillant commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} en bénéficiant d'une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture partielle{/g}, le cyber-mastiff reçoit un bonus de +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} et bénéficie d'une {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g} augmentées de +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} %.
Si le surveillant commence son tour en bénéficiant d'une couverture totale, ces bonus sont doublés.

languages.text:
Siber mastif, {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}sömürü{/g} altındaki bir hedefe saldırdığında, verilecek hasara {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} ile aynı bonusları kazanır. Saldırısı, hedefteki tüm {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}sömürüleri{/g} ortadan kaldırır.
Gözetmen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}kısmi siperde{/g} başlarsa siber mastif, +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerleri +%{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} artar. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
Gözetmen turuna tam siperde başlarsa bu bonuslar ikiye katlanır.

When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.

Атакуя цель, на которую наложены {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимости{/g}, кибермастиф получает такой же бонус к наносимому урону, как и его {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g}. Аналогично атаки фамильяра снимают все {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимости{/g} с цели.
Если надзиратель начинает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}частичном укрытии{/g}, на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} его кибермастиф получает +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}.
Если надзиратель начинает свой ход в полном укрытии, эти бонусы удваиваются.

languages.text:
{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}エクスプロイト{/g} を持つ対象を攻撃する場合、サイバースティフは{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g} と同じボーナスを与えるダメージに得る。その攻撃は対象からすべての{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}エクスプロイト{/g} を取り除く。
{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}部分的な援護{/g} の中で{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を開始した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g} の間、サイ バー・マスティフは+{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} を獲得し、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ドッジ{/g} と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}パリー{/g} が+{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}%増加する。
監督官がそのターンを完全遮蔽で開始した場合、これらのボーナスは2倍になる。
languages.original_text:
Атакуя цель, на которую наложены {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимости{/g}, кибермастиф получает такой же бонус к наносимому урону, как и его {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g}. Аналогично атаки фамильяра снимают все {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}уязвимости{/g} с цели.
Если надзиратель начинает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}частичном укрытии{/g}, на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} его кибермастиф получает +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}.
Если надзиратель начинает свой ход в полном укрытии, эти бонусы удваиваются.

traits.locale_text:
{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} を持つ対象を攻撃する場合、サイバースティフは{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} と同じボーナスを与えるダメージに得る。その攻撃は対象からすべての{g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} を取り除く。
{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}部分的な援護{/g} の中で{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターンを開始した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g} の間、サイ バー・マスティフは+{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} を獲得し、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ドッジ{/g} と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}パリー{/g} が+{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}%増加する。
Overseerがそのターンをフルカバーで開始した場合、これらのボーナスは2倍になる。

languages.text:
Attackiert der Cyber-Mastiff ein Ziel mit {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Ausnutzen{/g}, erhält er denselben Schadensbonus wie der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g}. Sein Angriff entfernt alle {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Ausnutzen{/g}-Stapel des Ziels.
Beginnt der Aufseher seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}teilweiser Deckung{/g}, erhält der Cyber-Mastiff 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und sein {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} wird um +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} % erhöht.
Beginnt der Aufseher seinen Zug in voller Deckung, werden diese Boni verdoppelt.
languages.original_text:
When attacking a target with {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains the same bonus to damage dealt as the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}. Its attack removes all {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}exploits{/g} from the target.
If the Overseer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g}, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the cyber-mastiff gains +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and has its {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} increased by +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c}%.
If the Overseer starts their turn in full cover, these bonuses are doubled.

traits.locale_text:
Attackiert der Cyber-Mastiff ein Ziel mit {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Ausnutzen{/g}, erhält er denselben Schadensbonus wie der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g}. Sein Angriff entfernt alle {g|f:66e7b370e32b43118315ab0fd24a7f0d}Ausnutzen{/g}-Stapel des Ziels.
Beginnt der Aufseher seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}teilweiser Deckung{/g}, erhält der Cyber-Mastiff 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +{uip|Overseer INT Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und sein {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} wird um +{uip|Overseer PER Bonus|ce95a986c4044c0ca07fd0db9915388c} % erhöht.
Beginnt der Aufseher seinen Zug in voller Deckung, werden diese Boni verdoppelt.
